welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ewa Gentry, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Interisland Terminal
terminals.description: The interisland terminal at Honolulu International Airport serves flights between the Hawaiian islands.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

airports.airport_name: Kaneohe Bay MCAS (Marion E. Carl Field) Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Kaneohe Bay MCAS Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
